description: This file serves as a skeleton for a Natural Language Query (NLQ) service, providing a placeholder function for converting user natural language input into MongoDB queries. It includes a TODO comment indicating pending implementation of rule-based or AI-augmented query parsing.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_nlq_to_query(nlq: str)
methods.description: Converts a natural language query string to a MongoDB filter dictionary (currently a placeholder implementation).
